description: Only 7 years old she was saved from being attacked by several undead by Takashi after her father was killed by members of a household who wouldn`t allow them safety. Innocent and passive, Alice is the only member of the group that maintains a cheerful attitude despite all their troubles and the loss of her parents. Looking up to everyone in the group as a bigger brother and sister, she is unwilling to leave them even if it`s for her own safety.
name: Maresato Alice
